column4: hi all, i am using UDE 10.04 but the systems doesn't respond after running for arbitrary amount of time. No KB, no mouse.
Yes, what seems to be your problem
The PC hangs itself after running for sometime
What programs do you have generally running?

& others: sometime I run Xine also
